abstract: Neil Munro of The Daily Caller interrupted the president as he was making his statement from the Rose Garden. “It’s not time for questions, sir,” Mr. Obama said. “Not while I’m speaking.”
snippet: Neil Munro of The Daily Caller interrupted the president as he was making his statement from the Rose Garden. “It’s not time for questions, sir,” Mr. Obama said. “Not while I’m speaking.”
lead_paragraph: 4:40 p.m. | Updated The interruption stunned White House correspondents and television viewers. And it clearly surprised President Obama, too.

headline.main: Reporter Interrupts Obama During Statement on Immigration
